item.title: Perspectives on Catastrophes in the London Review of Books
item.description: What follows is a summary of 12 articles published in print or online by the LRB. It covers fat-tailed distributions, the traditional natural catastrophe perils, climate change and man-made, ecological collapse. I pick out a few common themes and summarise these at the end.
